#summary Documentation on the Navigating Networks Protovis API

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

<h1>Protovis API</h1>

The Protovis API provides the functionality export data in a format that can be used with the [http://vis.stanford.edu/protovis/ Protovis] visualisation library.

The details of the API are as follows:

== Base URL ==

The base URL for the Lookup API is as follows:

http://beta.ausstage.edu.au/networks/protovis?

Combining this URL with the parameters outlines below retrieves data from the [NavigatingNetworksDataset Navigating Networks Dataset].

== Available Parameters ==

|| *Name* || *Possible Values* || *Optional* || *Default* ||
|| task   || ego-centric-network || No || ||
|| id     || unique contributor id || No || ||
|| radius || Integer between 1 and 3 ||	 Yes || 1 ||

=== task ===
The task parameter defines the type of export that is undertaken. Currently only one task is available which is an egocentric network for a contributor and their immediate collaborators. 

=== id ===
The id parameter defines the unique identifier of the contributor that is of interest.

=== radius ===
The desired number of edges between the central node and the peripheral nodes of the network.
